casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Franklin HURT. No. 192A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 2, 2005. Lisa Bradley Dawson, Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney Generals, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hurt.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of September 2005 by Attorney General to Stay Issuance of Mandate:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of September 2005."
